column4: guys, what firewalls r u using, im using firestarter and its boring, i need one more prof, or is there iptables in ubuntu to setup ?
i can reccommend shorewall
shorewall is it good ?
excellent. very nice way of setting up policies and defining rules. monitor modes are very sensible and verbose.
apt-get install shorewall and then for a standalone setup http://www.shorewall.net/standalone.htm
do you have a two-interface setup?
what do u mean by 2 interface setup ?
two network interfaces/devices
yes dude
ok, see the 'two interface setup' in that case..
http://www.shorewall.net/two-interface.htm
'fdisk -l' is /dev/hda1 not the current root partition?
shorewall it seems hard to config :)
hmm i didn't find it so bad at all.
man i installed the tar.gz adobe but i cant find the excutable file to run ?!?!
eh?
i wen to the root folder but i didnt find the file
think you've mistaken a conversation with someone else. i know nothing of acroread
lol yes sorry :)
don't msg me :! /dev/hda1 isn't your current active linux partition?
/dev/hda1 the windows partion, and /dev/hda7 the linux one
type 'mount' what is the mountpoint for /dev/hda1?
/dev/hda1 on /media/C: type ntfs (rw,umask=0222), sorry for lating
